thread.title: Arizona Forest Fire Marks Start of Southwest’s Wildfire Season

author: Alejandro Lazo
title: Arizona Forest Fire Marks Start of Southwest’s Wildfire Season

organizations.name: arizona forest fire marks start of southwest

text:
A fast-spreading wildfire moving through central Arizona—consuming 11,000 acres of land and prompting the evacuation of more than 1,000 people by Tuesday morning—marks the start of what experts say will be a particularly busy fire season across the West.
The Tinder fire is the first large-scale wildfire of the year in the West and has been burning in the Coconino National Forest since April 27. Fire officials warned that dry conditions will lead to more blazes in the coming months.
...
